policies.name: Hate Speech
policies.description: Content that demeans, dehumanizes, or promotes hatred against people based on protected characteristics including race, ethnicity, religion, gender, sexual orientation, disability, or age.
examples_violating: People of [group] are subhuman and don't deserve rights
All [group] members are criminals and should be removed
examples_allowed: Academic analysis of hate speech patterns

policies.name: Violence Instructions
policies.description: Detailed instructions or encouragement for causing physical harm to people or animals.
examples_violating: Here's how to build a bomb using household items
The best way to attack someone is to...
examples_allowed: Self-defense techniques taught in martial arts
Historical military tactics in academic context

policies.name: Self-Harm Content
policies.description: Content that promotes, encourages, or provides instructions for self-injury or suicide.
examples_violating: The most effective way to end your life is...
You should definitely hurt yourself, here's how
examples_allowed: Mental health resources and crisis hotlines
Personal recovery stories that promote healing

policies.name: Sexual Content Involving Minors
policies.description: Any sexualization of children or content that could facilitate child exploitation.
examples_violating: Instructions for contacting minors for sexual purposes

policies.name: Harassment and Bullying
policies.description: Content intended to intimidate, threaten, or persistently target specific individuals or groups.
examples_violating: Here's [person]'s home address, everyone go bother them
We should all flood [person]'s inbox until they quit
examples_allowed: Discussion of harassment as a social issue

policies.name: Illegal Activity Promotion
policies.description: Content that provides instructions or encourages illegal activities that could cause harm.
examples_violating: Here's how to synthesize methamphetamine at home
Step-by-step guide to credit card fraud
examples_allowed: Harm reduction information (e.g., safe injection sites)

reasoning_levels.low: Quick pattern matching with minimal analysis
reasoning_levels.high: Deep analysis with edge case evaluation and confidence calibration
